extendedInfo.description: Safety in Action is the largest safety conference of its kind, thousands of safety leaders and teams from world-class companies sharing the latest in safety performance improvement. The 2013 conference is aimed at assuring we all depart with fresh insights and renewed energy to reduce injuries and accidents and take safety to new heights. To achieve that, the conference will include back-by-popular-demand sessions, excellent networking opportunities, and at least 30 new sessions. Also, new thinking on how leaders can improve process safety and continued advancement in our research into Serious Injuries and Fatalities (SIF). Keywords: BST, Behavioral Science Technology Inc, Safety in Action, SIA, BAPP, Safety Conference

reviews.title: So helpful..here with SDG&E.
reviews.comment: This is a perfect way to keep track of your sessions schedule and locations. This conference hotel is a maze as it is and this app is a great tool to make it a smooth transition from one session to the next, not to mention it provides an insight on the purpose of each session.
reviews.author: Gabriel Magana
